how 2 sign out a risd credit card
  1. sign into RISD OrgSync
  2. go onto RISD STEAM page
  3. Create an event and wait for approval
  4. Retrieve event ID
  5. Fill in budget request
  6. Fill in credit card sign-out form
  7. Go to CSI Office (2nd floor Carr Haus 9am-1pm M-F) to pick up credit card from walk-in advisor. They may approve your credit card request then
